channel.title: Game doesn't seem to load new mod
channel.description: I just set it up last night. I have been watching the video on this and what a pain. anyway. I see the PAK and SIG files being made. It's just when I go in-game. That the mod doesn't show in-game in the milestone. anyone have an idea what would cause this and a fix for it.

item.title: Game doesn't seem to load new mod
item.dc:creator: @iceman11a Iceman11a *
item.description:
@iceman11a wrote:

Earl, It’s been fixed. Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Game doesn't seem to load new mod

item.title: Game doesn't seem to load new mod
item.dc:creator: @EarlWare Earl Ware
item.description:
@EarlWare wrote:

iceman11a:

ve been watching the video on this and what a pain. anyway. I see the PAK and SIG files being made. It’s just when I go in-game. That the mod doesn’t show in-game in the milestone. anyone have an idea what would cause this and a fix for it.

Did you make sure to include InitMod, which inherits from SMLInitMod, and add your schematic to the MSchematics array?

Read full topic
item.source: Game doesn't seem to load new mod

item.title: Game doesn't seem to load new mod
item.dc:creator: @iceman11a Iceman11a *
item.description:
@iceman11a wrote:

Thank you for a reply. i figure it out and I got some help at last. and it’s up and running again. This is my mod called Minecarts 2.

Read full topic
